author: gstein
msg: Finish the REPOS commit editor's complete() callback to perform the
commit and run the info callback.
Refactored the callback invocation for use by the Ev1 and Ev2 editors.
(invoke_commit_cb): factored out of close_edit(), gathers up the
(complete_cb): implement. call hooks, perform the commit, handle the
results, and invoke the notification callback.
